title: Mid / Top looking for duo.

embed.description: Salrith / Silver 3 84LP / 22W 18L Win Ratio 55% / Jhin - 8W 5L Win Ratio 62%, Jinx - 4W 4L Win Ratio 50%, Kassadin - 2W 3L Win Ratio 40%, Xayah - 1W 3L Win Ratio 25%, Thresh - 2W 1L Win Ratio 67%

body:
Hi all, new to the forum.. 

I'm currently learning mid and top lane, for myself in solo queue. Considering picking up adc, I'm looking for someone to play with. 

Top Pool: Malphite / Darius / Panth 
Mid Pool: Ori / Annie / Ekko / Fizz 
ADC: Lucian / Kalista / Jhin / Varus / Cait / Kog 
Jungle: Hec / Vi / Rek'Sai / Zac 

I can play jungle comfortably, adc I am learning averaging around 60 / 70 cs by 10 minutes.

Anyways looking at playing with someone, hit me up by adding me in game. I will rarely look on here for comments or add request.

Thank you.

Silver 3 in Solo Queue.
